txt.en:
[placeholder],

I am Mainio, a man of the north. I disobey my elders by sending this south with traders, but I know that we are in need of aid, and I hope that someone will hear this plea. 

Seek me in Forochel outside of our camp Kauppa-k√∂ti in the place known as Taur Orthon.

Mainio
'You have come because of my letter. This is good to know.\n\n'You are a strange-looking person. I am sorry...I am glad you are here to help.'
You received a request for assistance in the snow-covered land of Forochel.
Talk to Mainio at Taur Orthon in Forochel

Taur Orthon is north of Ost Forod in Evendim in the frozen land of Forochel. Mainio stated that he awaits anyone who will come outside of the settlement.\n\nMainio, acting against his elders, has asked for assistance in Forochel.
